name: HELLENIC LABORATORIES ASSOCIATION
membership: HELLAS LAB is a member of EUROLAB
goal: The Hellenic Association of Laboratories - HELLASLAB was founded in 1997 and is the official association of laboratories in Greece and a national member of the European Laboratory Association - EUROLAB. The aim of HELLASLAB is to promote the quality of services provided by testing and calibration laboratories, through reliable, non-discriminatory, comparable and traceable measurement procedures.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives:
Single Market and Standards
CE marking
Research and Innovation
Digital Single Market
Energy
Environment
Food safety
Competition
